// License header comment.
// Second line of license.

syntax = "proto3";

// Comment about Foo.
message Foo {
  // Comment about name.
  string name = 1; // Trailing comment on field.

  // Detached comment.

  // Comment about id.
  int32 id = 2;
}

enum Type {
  TYPE_UNSPECIFIED = 0;
}
// This is a trailing comment on '}', but
// it should remain here.

// These comments are attached to the EOF.
